EntityCategoryMatcher - Class in com.example.questplugin.util
The EntityCategoryMatcher class contains a single method, EntityCategoryMatcher.matches(String, String), which takes a target category (e.g., "HOSTILE", "PASSIVE", "BOSS", or "UNDEAD") and an entity type, then returns a boolean indicating whether the given entity type matches the target category.
